item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, February 2, 2025 at 8:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Everyone knows your location: tracking myself down through in-app ads (402 points | 135 comments)
2. ScatterBrain: Unmasking the Shadow of PoisonPlug's Obfuscator (14 points | discuss)
3. Reinforcement Learning: An Overview (December 2024) (52 points | 8 comments)
4. Sniffnet – monitor your Internet traffic (134 points | 42 comments)
5. Show HN: Lume – OS lightweight CLI for MacOS & Linux VMs on Apple Silicon. (188 points | 53 comments)
6. Reverse-engineering and analysis of SanDisk High Endurance microSDXC card (2020) (195 points | 69 comments)
7. Show HN: Groundhog AI Spring API (25 points | 8 comments)
8. Analyzing the codebase of Caffeine: a high performance caching library (160 points | 24 comments)
9. Life is more than an engineering problem (262 points | 139 comments)
10. Why Do War Thunder Players Leak Classified Information? [video] (7 points | discuss)
11. Spaced repetition can allow for infinite recall (2022) (85 points | 112 comments)
12. Show HN: ESP32 RC Cars (228 points | 36 comments)
13. Macrodata Refinement (539 points | 285 comments)
14. The PETG adhesive test [video] (29 points | 11 comments)
15. RLHF Book (368 points | 29 comments)
16. Inheritance and Subtyping (26 points | 10 comments)
17. Show HN: Modest – musical harmony library for Lua (50 points | 6 comments)
18. Fixing Left and Mutual Recursions in Grammars (85 points | 20 comments)
19. AstroForge selects target for "high risk, seat of the pants" asteroid mission (73 points | 54 comments)
20. Repeat Offenders May Be Responsible for Many Shark Attacks (9 points | 4 comments)
21. A Rust procedural language handler for PostgreSQL (94 points | 18 comments)
22. Recent results show that LLMs struggle with compositional tasks (290 points | 234 comments)
23. Bzip3: A spiritual successor to BZip2 (310 points | 164 comments)
24. Visualizing all books of the world in ISBN-Space (452 points | 85 comments)
25. The doctor who gave himself an ulcer and solved a medical mystery (2010) (39 points | 43 comments)
26. A bookmarklet to kill sticky headers (2013) (191 points | 82 comments)
27. LMD: A new, less wasteful metal 3D printing technique (125 points | 25 comments)
28. Enhancing your MIDI devices with Perl (109 points | 30 comments)
29. Archivists work to save disappearing data.gov datasets (706 points | 206 comments)
30. Python 3, Pygame, and Debian Bookworm on the Miyoo A30 (147 points | 28 comments)
